page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content: There is a number of clubs in Huntly. The Speedo and the Boys Brigade are just examples. Here is a list of the clubs Badminton,Guides,Boxing,Cricket, Boys Brigade,Youth Club,Golf,Keepfit, Rifle club,Speedo and Play group. Speedo is speed swimming. The Speedo club meets at the swimming pool. The twenty members are aged six to fifteen. They meet on a Friday after school from four o'clock to five o'clock. The club has existed for four years and travels to different towns to compete . The Boys' Brigade's aim is to advance Christ's Kingdom among boys and to promote habits of obedience and discipline. They meet once every week in the hall of the Gordon Primary school. There are two sections of Boys' Brigade.
